name: Lollypop
description: Lollypop is a distinctive music player. It supports all common audio formats. Lollypop has a super music search function, you can fast locate the music you want, add music to you favorite and play it as per your wish.

en_US.description: Lollypop is a distinctive music player. It supports all common audio formats. Lollypop has a super music search function, you can fast locate the music you want, add music to you favorite and play it as per your wish.
en_US.name: Lollypop

zh_CN.description: Lollypop是一款很有特色的音乐播放软件，支持所有常见的音频格式。Lollypop具有超强的音乐搜索功能，可以让您快速定位到要查找的歌曲。您可以将自己喜欢的歌曲收藏起来，随时随地的播放。
zh_CN.name: Lollypop
